package.name: carce
package.description: SyncroSim Base Package for simulating the cumulative effects of development and climate change on caribou.

package.name: carep
package.description: SyncroSim Base Package for simulating the energy and protein dynamics of caribou.

package.name: carmove
package.description: SyncroSim Base Package for simulating the movement of caribou across a landscape.

package.name: conn-cons
package.description: SyncroSim Base Package for identifying conservation priorities based on habitat connectivity.

package.name: cscape
package.description: SyncroSim Base Package for running the Circuitscape landscape connectivity analysis program.

package.name: dgsim
package.description: SyncroSim Base Package for simulating demographics of wildlife populations.

package.name: netlogo
package.description: SyncroSim Base Package for running the NetLogo agent-based modeling environment.

package.name: stsim
package.description: SyncroSim Base Package for developing state-and-transition simulation models using ST-Sim.

package.name: stsim-dmult
package.description: SyncroSim Add-On Package (to stsim) for generating dynamic multipliers in ST-Sim.

package.name: stsim-ecodep
package.description: SyncroSim Add-On Package (to stsim) for calculating ecological departure in ST-Sim using the LANDFIRE Fire Regime Condition Class.

package.name: stsim-farsite
package.description: SyncroSim Add-On Package (to stsim) for using the FARSITE fire model with ST-Sim.

package.name: stsim-prms
package.description: SyncroSim Add-On Package (to stsim) that supports the integration of the PRMS hydrologic model with ST-Sim.

package.name: stsim-stockflow
package.description: SyncroSim Add-On Package (to stsim) for integrating stocks and flows into state-and-transition simulation models in ST-Sim.
